name: Easy Product Tabs For WooCommerce – Adding custom tabs for all products
author: Leo Q

sections.description:
Built for WooCommerce store owners, make it easy to adding custom tabs showing for all products.

FEATURES

  • Easy to add, update and delete product tabs.
  • Change priority of product tabs.
  • Show product tab for specific categories.
  • WordPress WYSIWYG supported.

SUPPORT

Please use WordPress Support Forum
sections.installation:
Quick setup:

  1. Download & Activate the plugin on WordPress Admin Dashboard
  2. Fill tab name and content then save all changes.
sections.faq:
1. My saved tab did not show up

Please make sure both tab name and content are filled, otherwise your tab will not show up on product page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 – 19/09/2018

  • Fix bug select categories.

1.0.1 – 19/09/2018

  • Support add tab on specific categories.

1.0.0 – 02/07/2018

  • Initialize first version of plugin.
